trips.purpose: NovaTech APAC Partnership Summit & Investor Meetings

hotels.name: Aman Tokyo
hotels.notes: Corner suite, 33rd floor. Late checkout confirmed.

items: 3:30 PM — Arrive NRT, private transfer to hotel
7:00 PM — Welcome dinner with NovaTech APAC team at Sukiyabashi Jiro
9:00 AM — NovaTech Partnership Summit (Day 1)
12:30 PM — Lunch with Takeshi Yamamoto (NovaTech Japan MD)
2:00 PM — Product demo & integration workshop
7:00 PM — Dinner with SoftBank Vision Fund team
9:00 AM — Partnership Summit (Day 2) — deal structure sessions
1:00 PM — Free afternoon — optional temple visit
6:30 PM — Investor dinner at The Capitol Hotel Tokyu
10:00 AM — Meeting with Rakuten Ventures
2:00 PM — Meeting with Toyota Ventures (AI division)
5:00 PM — Wrap-up call with Acme team (9 PM PT)
7:00 PM — Solo dinner — reservation at Den (2-Michelin star)
10:00 AM — Checkout & morning at Tsukiji Outer Market
2:00 PM — Transfer to NRT
5:00 PM — Depart NRT → SFO

trips.weather: Tokyo: 48-55°F, partly cloudy, 20% chance of rain. Pack layers and an umbrella.
trips.notes: Pocket WiFi reserved. Business cards printed (Japanese side). Gift: Napa Valley wine for NovaTech team.

research.response:
**Sushi Saito** — Legendary omakase, 3 Michelin stars. Reservation nearly impossible but worth trying.
**Umi** — Intimate counter seating, excellent seasonal fish, more accessible.
**Sushi no Midori** — High quality at reasonable prices, expect a queue.
**Manten Sushi** — Local favorite near Shibuya station, great lunch sets.

**Getting there:** Odakyu Romance Car from Shinjuku (85 min, reserved seats, scenic).
**Top onsen:** Tenzan Tohji-kyo (outdoor rotenburo, mountain views, day-use ¥1,300).
**Hakone Open-Air Museum** — World-class sculpture garden, Picasso collection.
**Tip:** Get the Hakone Free Pass (¥6,100) — covers train, bus, ropeway, and pirate ship on Lake Ashi.

research.request: Best coffee shops for morning work sessions

hotels.name: The Standard, High Line
hotels.notes: Hudson River view room. Expensed to corporate card.

items: 3:30 PM — Arrive JFK
6:00 PM — Pre-conference drinks with YC founders
9:00 AM — TechCrunch Disrupt (main stage panel at 2 PM)
7:00 PM — Sequoia dinner
10:00 AM — Investor meetings (back-to-back)
5:00 PM — Founders Fund office visit
11:00 AM — Brunch with a16z partner
6:00 PM — Depart JFK

trips.notes: Great trip. 4 warm investor intros secured. Sequoia expressed strong Series B interest.
